    5. Carmel Domshlak, Joerg Hoffmann Fast Probabilistic Planning Through Weighted Model Counting (in ICAPS'06)
    6. Rune Jensen, Eric Hansen, Simon Richards, Rong Zhou Memory-Efficient Symbolic Heuristic Search (in ICAPS'06)
    7. H. Palacios and H. Geffner Compiling Uncertainty Away: Solving Conformant Planning Problems Using a Classical Planner (in AAAI'06)
    8. B. Bonet and H. Geffner Heuristics for Planning with Penalties and Rewards using Compiled Knowledge (in KR'06)
    9. R. Korf Design of Heuristic Functions (2006)
    10. R. Korf Disjoint Pattern Database Heuristics (2001)
    11. R. Zhou and E. Hansen Domain-Independent Structured Duplicated Detection (AAAI'06)
    12. R. Zhou and E. Hansen External-Memory Pattern Databases Using Structured Duplicate Detection (AAAI'05)
    13. R. Zhou and E. Hansen Beam-Stack: Integrating Backtracking with Beam Search (ICAPS'05)
    14. J. Huang Combining Knowledge Compilation and Search for Conformant Probabilistic Planning (ICAPS'06)
    15. I. Little and S. Thiebaux Concurrent Probabilistic Planning in the Graphplan Framework (ICAPS'06)
